statements: UPDATE Financial_Indicators SET Revenue = 50000 WHERE Company_ID = 1;
UPDATE Financial_Indicators SET Net_Profit = 20000 WHERE Company_ID = 2;
UPDATE Financial_Indicators SET Operating_Expenses = 15000 WHERE Company_ID = 3;
UPDATE Financial_Indicators SET Net_Profit = 50000 WHERE Company_ID = 1;
UPDATE Financial_Indicators SET Revenue = Revenue + 10000, Net_Profit = Net_Profit - 5000 WHERE Company_ID = 2;
UPDATE Financial_Indicators SET EBITDA = Revenue - Operating_Expenses WHERE Company_ID = 3;
UPDATE FinancialRatios SET profit_margin = 0.15 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE PerformanceIndicators SET earnings_per_share = 2.5 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE FinancialRatios SET current_ratio = 1.8 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE FinancialRatios SET profit_margin = 0.15, return_on_assets = 0.12 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE PerformanceIndicators SET debt_to_equity_ratio = 1.5, earnings_per_share = 3.25 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE FinancialRatios SET current_ratio = 2.5 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE financial_ratios SET attribute1 = 10 WHERE attribute2 = 'abc';
UPDATE performance_indicators SET indicator_value = 25.6 WHERE indicator_name = 'Sales';
UPDATE decision_making SET decision_date = '2023-01-15' WHERE decision_id = 1;
UPDATE financial_ratios SET attribute2 = 'New Value' WHERE attribute1 = 1;
UPDATE performance_indicators SET indicator_value = 10.5 WHERE indicator_name = 'Revenue';
UPDATE decision_making SET decision_name = 'Approved' WHERE decision_id = 1001;
UPDATE Financial_Statements SET revenue = 10000 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Ratios SET ratio_value = 1.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Performance_Indicators SET target_value = 500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Financial_Statements SET revenue = revenue * 1.1, expenses = expenses * 0.9 WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE Ratios SET ratio_value = numerator / denominator WHERE ratio_name = 'Profit Margin' AND ratio_value < 0.1;
UPDATE Performance_Indicators SET actual_value = actual_value + 500 WHERE date = '2022-03-15' AND indicator_name = 'Sales Growth';
UPDATE financial_ratios SET profit_margin = 0.25 WHERE name = 'Company A';
UPDATE performance_indicators SET return_on_assets = 0.12 WHERE name = 'Company B';
UPDATE liquidity_ratios SET quick_ratio = 1.5 WHERE name = 'Company C';
UPDATE financial_ratios SET revenue = revenue * 1.1, profit_margin = net_income / revenue * 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE performance_indicators SET return_on_assets = (net_income + revenue) / assets * 100 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE efficiency_ratios SET inventory_turnover = inventory_turnover * 1.2, asset_turnover = revenue / assets WHERE id = 3;
